apiqueries module¶

apiqueries.query_ammo()¶

Sends query for ammo and saves to json.

apiqueries.query_images()¶

Threaded image downloader. Uses items.json not parts!

apiqueries.query_parts()¶

Sends query for modding parts and saves to json.

apiqueries.query_traders()¶

Send query of traders and saves json.

apiqueries.query_weapons()¶

Sends query for guns and saves to json.

apiqueries.send_query(cur_query)¶

Sends graphql query

Parameters:

cur_query – graphQL query string

Returns:

response from request

apiqueries.unify_image_size(img, to_dim: int)¶

Expand pic to square and scale to size.

Parameters:

  • img – 3d image

  • to_dim – integer

apiqueries.windows_name_fix(path)¶
